abstract: Sean Avery was a fan favorite at Madison Square Garden, though much of the rest of the hockey world did not hold him in such high esteem.
snippet: Sean Avery was a fan favorite at Madison Square Garden, though much of the rest of the hockey world did not hold him in such high esteem.
lead_paragraph: The latest chapter for one of New York's most colorful and controversial professional athletes may have ended Tuesday when the Rangers placedSean Avery on waivers.

headline.main: Rangers Waive an Agitator Who Stirred Up Opponents and Headlines
